Breadown/Pyro/Hiss:

::Pyro landed in his scaly, black dragon mode, his four paws digging into the 
ground from his weight, the massive sight transforming to its robot mode, a 
flame cannon held by both hands::
"All clear."

::Hiss slithered down a tree in a spiral pattern, transforming to robot mode 
with a fusion cannon in his right hand::

::A very large termite took a big bite out of a tree, quickly eating the wood 
and gaining some energy, transforming to robot mode with a grenade launcher::
"Hmmm...." (Breakdown 'said' as he saw Quickstrike entering a forest, with 
Senesis)
"Er, Quickstrike!  Halt!  A friend of yours sent us to escort you to 
somewhere.  We are the Oblitercons.  A mercenary team."
::He nodded to Hiss and Pyro, Hiss making his weapon look casual, but in fact 
it was in a position to pop up in milliseconds at Sinesis, and Pyro's at 
Quickstrike::
